content:
When I try to run the IG Publisher with FHIR v 4.1.0 I have this error back (see also https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/215610-shorthand/topic/how.20to.20indicate.20version.204b.20.3F)

Publishing Content Failed: Error: the IG declares that is based on version 4.1.0 but this IG publisher only supports publishing the following versions: 1.0.2, 1.4.0, 3.0.2, 4.0.1, 4.6.0 (00:13.0223)

Any help is appreciated :-)
the automatic build fails due to the problem reported in https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/215610-shorthand/topic/how.20to.20indicate.20version.204b.20.3F.
